TextEng: Furten
Text: 퍼튼

TextEng: You know we're still a week away from the encampment, brother. And that's with good weather.
Text: 야영지까지 아직 일주일 남았잖아, 형. 날씨 좋을 때 말이야.

TextEng: Yes, well, I don't like it either. But those Ao fellows do throw a good party.
Text: 그래, 나도 싫어. 하지만 에이오 녀석들 파티는 끝내주거든.

TextEng: Sand. It's everywhere, you know.
Text: 모래야. 진짜 어디든 있다니까.

TextEng: Yes, there too. Sorry... my brother gets a bit fidgety in the desert.
Text: 응, 거기도. 미안... 형이 사막만 오면 좀 불안해해.

TextEng: Now that's not a very nice thing to say to <him/her>.
Text: 그건 <him/her>한테 할 말이 아니잖아.

TextEng: Oh, well *excuse me* for mis-hearing you, Mister Mumbley-pants.
Text: 오, 잘못 들은 거 *실례했네요*, 우물우물 씨.

TextEng: The desert's not so bad. You always gripe when we're passing through.
Text: 사막이 그렇게 나쁘진 않아. 형은 지나갈 때마다 투덜대잖아.

TextEng: Okay, them scorpion fellows aside. It could have been beholders... remember the beholders?
Text: 좋아, 그 전갈 놈들 빼고. 주시자였을 수도 있잖아... 주시자 기억나?

TextEng: Don't mind him. He had a bit o' bad soup last night. Was belchin' something fierce, let me tell you.
Text: 신경 쓰지 마. 어젯밤 수프가 상했거든. 트림을 얼마나 하던지.

TextEng: Oh. Well I don't think <he/she> wants to hear *that*.
Text: 오. 글쎄 <he/she>가 *그 얘기*까지 듣고 싶을 것 같진 않은데.

TextEng: He says you have our thanks for finding the guide. Now we can leave.
Text: 형이 안내인을 찾아줘서 고맙대. 이제 출발할 수 있겠어.

TextEng: Well, yes I told <him/her>. Didn't you hear me tell <him/her>?
Text: 그래, 내가 <him/her>한테 말했잖아. 내가 <him/her>한테 말하는 거 못 들었어?

TextEng: Oh. He says you're not so bad... even if you're not a halfling. High praise from him.
Text: 오. 형이 나쁘지 않은 사람이래... 하플링이 아니어도. 형한테선 대단한 칭찬이야.

TextEng: Oh. He says that you're one of the bravest halflings he's ever met. Not bad, coming from Mr. Grumpy, here.
Text: 오. 형이 지금까지 만난 하플링 중 가장 용감한 편이래. 여기 투덜이 씨한테서 나온 말치곤 나쁘지 않지.

TextEng: You don't suppose we'll see some Asabi again, do you?
Text: 아사비를 또 만나진 않겠지, 그치?

TextEng: Okay, okay, forget I mentioned it. My brother has this *thing* against them Asabi. Just because they tried to eat him once. Pfft.
Text: 알았어, 알았어, 잊어. 형은 아사비한테 *앙심*이 있어. 한 번 잡아먹히려고 해서. 쯧.

TextEng: Blech. I got sand in my mouth. Again.
Text: 웩. 입에 모래가 들어갔어. 또.

TextEng: Hmm. Come to think of it, you're right, brother. That *does* taste like last night's soup, doesn't it?
Text: 흠. 생각해보니 맞네, 형. 어젯밤 수프 맛이랑 *똑같아*, 그치?

TextEng: Crimeny! I wonder how long the trip through the desert's going to be this time!
Text: 세상에! 이번엔 사막 여행이 얼마나 걸릴지 모르겠네!

TextEng: Shush, you. I don't need to hear that kind of talk when we still got more than a week to go.
Text: 쉿, 형. 아직 일주일 넘게 남았는데 그런 소리 하지 마.

TextEng: I suppose you'll be trying to find that guide, then, hey?
Text: 그럼 그 안내인을 찾으러 갈 거지, 응?

TextEng: He may still be alive, brother. You have to try and think positive.
Text: 아직 살아있을 수도 있어, 형. 긍정적으로 생각해봐.

TextEng: What are the chances that guide's still alive, you think?
Text: 안내인이 아직 살아있을 확률이 얼마나 될까?

TextEng: True. If it had been the Asabi, like my brother said, then the guide would be a goner for sure. Lizard folk having funny tastes and all.
Text: 맞아. 형 말대로 아사비였으면 안내인은 끝장이지. 도마뱀 족속들 입맛이 좀 그렇잖아.

TextEng: That poor guide. Torias says they'll be sucking all the juices out of him before morning comes.
Text: 불쌍한 안내인. 토리아스 말로는 아침 되기 전에 진액을 다 빨릴 거래.

TextEng: Really? I'm not so sure I'd want to see that.
Text: 정말? 난 그거 보고 싶은지 잘 모르겠는데.

TextEng: Well, now, isn't that the guide there?
Text: 어, 저기 안내인 아니야?

TextEng: Sure it is. And he doesn't have any of his inner juices sucked out at all. Are you sure you're the guide we started out with, you?
Text: 맞네. 그리고 진액도 안 빨렸잖아. 우리랑 같이 출발한 그 안내인 맞아?

TextEng: Huh. Well, go figure.
Text: 허. 그래, 신기하네.

TextEng: Aren't we leaving yet? The guide's back now, isn't he?
Text: 아직 안 떠나? 안내인 돌아왔잖아, 그치?

TextEng: Quiet, you. The sooner we get underway, the sooner we'll get to the Ao encampment.
Text: 조용해, 형. 빨리 출발할수록 빨리 에이오 야영지에 도착하지.

TextEng: Yes, there was a foul taste to dinner last night.
Text: 그래, 어젯밤 저녁이 맛이 이상했어.

TextEng: Well, nobody ever said that a kobold was a proper cook, but he volunteered.
Text: 뭐, 코볼트가 제대로 된 요리사라고 한 사람은 없지만, 자원했잖아.

TextEng: There is no such thing as a wookalar.
Text: 우칼라 같은 건 없어.

TextEng: No, Uncle Duffer was eaten by a manticore, not a wookalar.
Text: 아니, 더퍼 삼촌은 만티코어한테 잡아먹혔어, 우칼라가 아니라.

TextEng: Now that's not a very nice thing to say to <him/her>.
Text: 그건 <him/her>한테 할 말이 아니잖아.

TextEng: You did too. Don't blame my hearing everytime I call you out for saying nasty things.
Text: 형이 그랬잖아. 내가 심한 말 지적할 때마다 내 귀 탓하지 마.

TextEng: The Bedine're not so bad. You just don't like their camels.
Text: 베다인은 그렇게 나쁘지 않아. 형은 그냥 낙타가 싫은 거잖아.

TextEng: No, I guess the hungry Bedine must have killed all the camels. I guess the nomads are good for something after all.
Text: 아니, 배고픈 베다인이 낙타를 다 잡아먹었나 봐. 유목민들도 쓸모가 있긴 하네.

TextEng: Watch your tongue there, Birgen. It's not him that smells, it's you.
Text: 말 조심해, 비르겐. 냄새나는 건 그 사람이 아니라 형이야.

TextEng: Once we get access to the water, I'm going to soak your head for a bit.
Text: 물을 구하면, 형 머리 좀 담가야겠어.

TextEng: What do you think are worse, stingers or ill-tempered dwarves?
Text: 뭐가 더 안 좋은 것 같아, 스팅어 아니면 성질 나쁜 드워프?

TextEng: Yes, it is more acceptable to smack a stinger with a hammer.
Text: 그래, 스팅어를 망치로 때리는 건 더 봐줄 만하지.

TextEng: That half-orc nearly squashed me flat last night when I went to bed.
Text: 어젯밤 자러 갔을 때 그 하프오크가 나를 거의 납작하게 깔 뻔했어.

TextEng: What do you mean it was an ox? Oh, I guess that's what the smell was.
Text: 황소였다니 무슨 소리야? 아, 그래서 그 냄새가 났구나.

TextEng: Crimeny! This trip through the desert's taking a long time!
Text: 세상에! 사막 여행이 너무 오래 걸리네!

TextEng: If you're so thirsty, mister grumbles, why don't you go deal with the problem? I didn't think so.
Text: 그렇게 목마르면 직접 가서 해결하지, 투덜이 씨? 그럴 줄 알았어.

TextEng: Hope we can get to that water soon.
Text: 빨리 물을 구할 수 있으면 좋겠어.

TextEng: Quiet, you. The sooner we get underway, the sooner we'll get to the Ao encampment.
Text: 조용해, 형. 빨리 출발할수록 빨리 에이오 야영지에 도착하지.

TextEng: So we got the water we need? That's a relief.
Text: 필요한 물을 구했어? 다행이다.

TextEng: So what? There's nothing wrong with wanting a bath. You should try it yourself sometime, brother.
Text: 그래서 뭐? 목욕하고 싶은 게 잘못이야? 형도 한번 해봐.
